reviews.review:
Wow, what a step back from the earlier games. CS 1.6 and CS: CZ are amazing online action games full of skill, strategy, and cleverness. CSS waters down the gameplay a great deal by removing the heavy recoil that made the earlier games, even Condition Zero Deleted Scenes, a challenge. In addition there are many classic maps from the previous games that were excluded from CSS just because they were obscure, so hidden gems like cs_estate and de_truth_cz are gone.

The only reason you want this game is for the Garry's Mod content. If you want a good CS games get 1.6.
I Just got this for gmod but gmod is a fuckfest so i give this game 4/10
Très bon jeu que je conseil fortement à la communauté steam ! Plein de mods proposées danslequelle on passe des très bon moments entre potes.
Очень ненравится когда на каком то сервере аимшик или другой вид читов , читеры те кто не умеют играть! А только с читами

Incontavel o quanto eu ri nesse game jogando x1 com os amigos, o quanto me divertir em multiplayers "competitivos" mais do que um bom jogo um excelente game.
Nota: 11/10
игра просто шикарная я пригласил друга он 1 неделю не вылезал из компа!! советую поиграть

Die Counter-Strike Rheie macht mir eine menge spaß Sowie zu den favorieten gehört auch Sorce dazu!!!!!

Für diese Spielrheie sag ich nur macht fun und da past zum teil der Song von Luke smith dazu https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZTkDqOcBiYA
Très bon jeu, en terme de graphisme c'est pas mal pour un 2004

Havent been much elsewhere than Aztec and Dust - but that doesn't mean I don't know the game. It's addictive, and accessible, fun and well balanced above all else.

Visual masterpiece it isn't but it certainly isn't ugly. The source engine is quite impressive, but you will notice this game is almost 10 years old. Regardless, if your loooking for a shooter get this. You have only one life though, and there is alot of getting used to like finding dedicated servers, or aiming well with snipers. It's more of a hardcore gamers game, but getting good at it doesn't take long.


+ Desert Eagle
Очень простая графика и отличным МП) Советую всем новичкам
The part where you hold a weapon and kill people is pretty good.
Lots of fun but i do reccomend buy CS source before beacause you will have errors and certain textures missing

Muito bom, ótimo grafico referente ao classico CS 1.6, mas não possui uma jogabilidade tão boa quanto como as versoes mais atualisadas. entretanto prefiro o suorce por ter um grafico melhor, e não dou importancia a jogabilidade nas novas versoes, sou mais do tipo clássico do 1.6, falta eles oferecerem um mode para poder jogar no momdo off-line aonde posso matar todos os inimigos com um bota, pois é chato quanto morro e ter que esperar todos os boots morrerem

Si no teneis un buen PC que os aguante Global offensive estable vale mucho la pena

Pros:
-No requiere tantos requisitos del PC
-Mejores graficos que el 1.6 
-Cantidad de servidores con un monton de modos de juego
-Recoil mejorado mas estable que el 1.6
-Infinidad de horas
-Motor mejorado

Contras:
-Se necesita muchas horas de  practica y si te con facilidad no te lo compres
-Su precio 19.99€ si quereis comprarlo, mirarlo rebajado o si podeis comprar el valve pack rebajado un 75% (unos 17.99€)
-No tiene cromos (si quieres aumentar tu nivel de steam no es un buena compra)

Este juego es para jugarlo con amigos, es para divertirse y en mi opinion el cs:go es mas para ser competitivo

Asi que si te he convencido no DUDES EN COMPRAR!!!

You can kill the hostages in a 1000 different ways
...oh, and you can save them as well if you're into that kind of stuff
4deadhostages/10
well what can i say.  good game.  good on the run.  great way to stay in shape.  only one thing they should add african safari animals.
Игра хорошая и даже лучшая . Но я бы хотел чтобы здесь добавили такую вещь как в кс го разновидное оружие и вещи и окрасках на них а так в общем Норм игра ! советую всем !
Muito bom, melhor que CS GO sem duvida, este jogo é um classico !
ОЧЕНЬ ХОРОШАЯ ИГРА, КОНЕЧНО ПОСЛЕ КС 1.6 ОЧЕНЬ НЕ ПРИВЫЧНО, НО СДЕСЬ ОЧЕНЬ МАЛО ЧИТЕРОВ ЭТО ХОРОШО, СОВЕТУЮ ПОИГРАТЬ ВСЕМ.

This was always my favorite of the the Counterstrike series , basic graphics but that does not matter the gameplay is superb.
I am a really big fan of the gun game mod on this and some of the sweet maps you get to play from simpsons , minecraft etc... Really great fun!.

Это классический CS 1.6 , только с улучшеной графикой!
Я буду играть  в нее очень долго!

Omg how do i get started!!! This game has been here for when i was bored out of my mind i cannot imagine a world without this game! Ok lets aim to the facts and + and - of the game.

+Introduces new kinds of gametype example : Jailbreak etc
+Anyone can get the hang of this game theres just basic FPS controls
+Community isnt bad
+Easily Entertaining
+Lose track of time
+Byfar my favorite game

-Lots of hackers
-No Compettitive
-No Custimization

Be sure to give me a Thumbs up if this helped!!!!!
played for many years enjoyed every minut of it

Counter Strike Feelig auf höchstem Niveau.

Einfach ein Klasse Spiel. So alt schon, und noch so modern. Top.

Me compré este juego debido a que mi PC no es tan buena, ya que el 1.6 los gráficos son lo mismo y lo jugué siglos de siglos, por eso decidí este porque el GO no me corría, bien, empezemos, es un juego con graficos medio: No es ni pesado ni antiguo, el motor Source es el más utilizado en los juegos de Valve Corporation© ya que ellos son los fabricantes, la inteligencia artificial la ví muy tonta, estaba jugando con BOTS y cuando me mataron estaba de spectator y ví cuanto tardaban en disparar, cuando se encontraban, se miraban, y recién disparaban, además de la mala (mala no, horrible) precisión, pero tampoco podemos decir que es una mala inteligencia artificial, yo solo me estoy refiriendo a los problemas que hay con ellos, bien, sigamos, la texturación de las armas, mapas y nuevos personajes ( son los mismos pero con una ropa más notable) Este juego supera al anterior Condition Zero, que yo lo veía como un gran juego y me decepciono mucho, el online es muy bueno, mapas variados, juegas con personas de diferentes países, etc. Además de los minijuegos, claro.
 Este juego, para mí, de la escala del 1 al 10, le doy un 8, no llega a 9 ni a 10 por la inteligencia artificial, que en mi parecer, me molestó mucho.
  Es un buen juego, entretenido y para jugarlo con amigos, no para jugar con personas que ni conoces o con los Bots, eso es lo que pienso, ojala puedan tener un buen dinero para poder gastarselo en este buen juego, que vale la pena.
Well, haven't really played that much, but seems like a decent game tbh

Counter Strike: Source is a great game. It brings back the classic gameplay elements from Counter Strike 1.6 while giving the game a fresh look and gameplay. Any fan of the counter strike series should definitley play this game.

Great game, lots of modding. Wish there was a ranking system or skins. But CSGO has that now. RIP source. 7/10

CSS is a bleh game. To many crappy servers, and to many hackers that spoil the gameplay. First time playing the game even though I already knew this was going to be a shitty game, but I gave it a try, and found out it was shittier then I thought. Not worth it. Really disappointed.

This is just my review of the game. You might have a different out look on it, so if you got nothing nice to say in the comments, I will just remove your comment.
